# options

**Instance Property**

A collection of mutually exclusive media selection options

## Declaration

```swift
var options: [AVMediaSelectionOption] { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of the property is an array of [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMediaSelectionOption] objects.

## Accessing media selection options

- **mediaSelectionOption(withPropertyList:)**: Returns the media selection options that match the given property list.
- **defaultOption**: The default option in the group.
